ygData.subject: Friend or Foe?
ygData.msgSnippet: ** Vlad looks down at the ship again, seeing it disappear into the blue depths of the ocean, his optics widening as he suddenly sees a large fireball develope

** Vlad looks down at the ship again, seeing it disappear into the blue 
depths of the ocean, his optics widening as he suddenly sees a large 
fireball develope where the ship had just been.
There went his rise home...and what he was going to pay his assassin with.
Vlad looked over at his pet as the animal places its head on his lap, 
petting the creatures head.**

" Looks like I have to take care of Von myself now, huh?"

** His voice was smooth and a little deep, along with his youth.
In human years he wouldn't seem to much older then 18, which he wasn't.
Though, rather handsome and strong for his age.
But Vlad was greedy from the day he was created, and had none too many 
friends. Though, he always thought he didn't really need any, as long as he 
got what he wanted.

But at the moment Vlad looked down at the animal, pulling a dark gray cape 
over his shoulders as the temperature dropped.
He growled, looking at the animal once again.**

" Figures, huh? I just had to get some slagging cold blodded salamander as a 
beast mode!"

** Vlad leaned back against the tub before he suddenly felt it jerk, looking 
up to see some bot catch hold ot it and begin to drag it.
He suddenly kneeled inside of the pod and knocked on the roof.*

" Hay!"
